Hamas chief blames Israel for stalled ceasefire talks, leaves door openHamas chief Ismail Haniyeh blamed Israel on Sunday for stalling ceasefire talks and rejecting Hamas's demand to end the war on Gaza, but said the group was still seeking a negotiated solution. Sun, 10 Mar 2024 19:51:03 GMT ZTXZH36EFZNITJWEVEJEMGNQI https://www.reuters.com/world/middle-east/hamas-chief-blames-israel-stalled-ceasefire-talks-leaves-door-open-2024-03-10/Nidal Al-Mughrabi世界中东地区
Netanyahu says at least 13,000 'terrorists' among Palestinians killedIsrael's Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu has told a German newspaper that at least 13,000 "terrorists" were among Palestinians killed during Israel's air and ground assault on Gaza. Sun, 10 Mar 2024 19:18:27 GMT H2PIQ4PR75NBJCAV4CONT https://www.reuters.com/world/middle-east/netanyahu-says-least-13000-terrorists-killed-among-palestinians-2024-03-10/Reuters世界中东地区
Ukraine minister, responding to Pope Francis, says Kyiv will never raise white flagForeign minister Dmytro Kuleba, responding to the pope's call to show "the courage of the white flag," said "Our flag is a yellow and blue one," and told the Vatican to pay heed to its role in World War Two. Sun, 10 Mar 2024 18:35:28 GMT F3WG2QHQWFK5XMRWWFVIRTWNCQ https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/ukrainian-minister-responding-pope-francis-says-kyiv-will-never-raise-white-flag-2024-03-10/Reuters世界欧洲
Macron backs 'end of life' bill, aims for parliament debate in MayPresident Emmanuel Macron said on Sunday for the first time that he backed new end-of-life legislation that would allow what he called "help to die" and wanted his government to put forward a draft bill to parliament in May. Sun, 10 Mar 2024 17:58:55 GMT A7HGZUXUXVIUVEPUWUFSBNLMYU https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/macron-backs-end-life-bill-aims-parliament-debate-may-2024-03-10/Elizabeth Pineau, John Irish世界欧洲
Libyan leaders agree to form new unified governmentThree key Libyan leaders said on Sunday they had agreed on the "necessity" of forming a new unified government that would supervise long-delayed elections. Sun, 10 Mar 2024 17:13:11 GMT 37GPHTKVUBMBFCCENFS3KXQ2NOW https://www.reuters.com/world/middle-east/libyan-leaders-agree-to-form-new-unified-government-2024-03-10/Reuters世界非洲
St. Petersburg airport resumes operations after drone shot down in nearby regionPulkovo airport in Saint Petersburg has resumed operations as Russian Defence Ministry said a Ukrainian drone was shot down in the neighbouring Leningrad region on Sunday. Sun, 10 Mar 2024 15:56:24 GMT BMS7774MTNIPG4HMMVMAWAC5MU https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/st-petersburg-airport-resumes-operations-after-drone-shot-down-nearby-region-2024-03-10/Reuters世界欧洲
Egypt in touch with Hamas and Israel in search of Gaza ceasefire deal, sources sayEgypt was in contact with senior Hamas and Israeli figures as well as other mediators on Sunday in an effort to restart negotiations for a truce in the Gaza Strip during the Muslim holy month of Ramadan, which begins on Monday or Tuesday, two Egyptian security sources said. Sun, 10 Mar 2024 15:28:28 GMT PGYG2EGVC5OFFOWDUCE6CNDUOM https://www.reuters.com/world/middle-east/egypt-touch-with-hamas-israel-search-gaza-ceasefire-deal-sources-say-2024-03-10/Reuters世界中东地区
Gaza aid ship waiting to sail from Cyprus as charity builds jetty, source saysA ship carrying tonnes of food for Gaza remained docked in a Cyprus port on Sunday as preparations were underway to launch a yet untested maritime aid route to the enclave, where the United Nations estimates a quarter of the population [USN:L2N3FJ212 TEXT:"faces starvation"]. Sun, 10 Mar 2024 15:19:46 GMT NDPTTCX2PJKPRHL3LWFQQU5VUI https://www.reuters.com/world/gaza-aid-ship-waiting-to-sail-cyprus-charity-builds-jetty-source-says-2024-03-10/Yiannis Kourtoglou, Stamos Prousalis世界
US, Jordan airdrop more aid to Gaza, US military saysThe United States and Jordan carried out a new airdrop of humanitarian aid to Gaza's Palestinians on Sunday, parachuting in more than 11,500 meals, the U.S. military said. Sun, 10 Mar 2024 14:12:45 GMT OYXCRRZA7BLWLL7EQOM3DXMJJA https://www.reuters.com/world/us-jordan-airdrop-more-aid-to-gaza-us-military-says-2024-03-10/Reuters世界
Sudan army general rules out Ramadan truce unless RSF leaves civilian sitesA top general from Sudan's army has ruled out a truce in the Islamic holy month of Ramadan unless the paramilitary group it is battling leaves civilian and public sites. Sun, 10 Mar 2024 13:21:12 GMT PELZRDKMCNLWZIRSKU3C2YDTEQ https://www.reuters.com/world/africa/sudan-army-general-rules-out-ramadan-truce-unless-rsf-leaves-civilian-sites-2024-03-10/El Tayeb Siddig, Khalid Abdelaziz世界非洲
Central African bloc lifts Gabon sanctionsThe Economic Community of Central African States agreed to lift sanctions on Gabon on Saturday and reintegrate it into the regional bloc, six months after suspending its membership in response to a coup that ousted President Ali Bongo. Sun, 10 Mar 2024 12:36:16 GMT UM4Y7RDGFRIJLJSLQ5YVTQX3TU https://www.reuters.com/world/africa/central-african-bloc-lifts-gabon-sanctions-2024-03-10/Reuters世界非洲
